New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers won their 12th consecutive game
Key Match Events: Darius Garland's 40-point performance led the Cavaliers to a comeback win
The Raptors opened up a 12-point lead late in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Cavaliers coach Kenny Atkinson praised Darius Garland's performance, saying 'he carried us'
Atkinson also stated that Garland's performance was further proof of why he should be a shoo-in for next month's All-Star game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played without Donovan Mitchell, who was missing from the Cavaliers lineup
Jarrett Allen provided 18 points with 15 rebounds, two blocks and a steal
Others: The article mentions other NBA games played on Thursday, including the Dallas Mavericks' win over the Portland Trail Blazers and the Minnesota Timberwolves' win over the Orlando Magic
